name: Cannot update the week start day of project with different strings -- @1.6

steps.name: Given I set up a "PUT" request to "/projects/{proj_id}" endpoint
And I set up the data
Then I get a "400" status code as response
And I verify the general_problem of error is: "'week_start_day' must be one of: sunday, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday"

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Functional Test Negative Cases of Update Projects
